articles.author: Jones Hayden
articles.title: Israeli strikes kill 22 in Gaza; terror suspected in Tel Aviv truck-ramming - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The Israeli military has stepped up its offensive in northern Gaza.
articles.content: In a separate development, a truck rammed into a bus stop near the Israeli city of Tel Aviv in what police believe was a terror attack, according to media reports. More than 30 people were injured in… [+1138 chars]
